title: Panchanga (Vedic/Hindu Calendar)
source: Panchāngam lunisolar system with Vikram Samvat era, 12 Hindu months, tithi/vara/nakshatra rings, and 6 Ritus.
notes: Panchāngam means 'five limbs': Tithi, Vara, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana.
Month cycle uses: Chaitra, Vaisakha, Jyeshtha, Ashadha, Shravana, Bhadrapada, Ashvina, Kartika, Margashirsha, Pausha, Magha, Phalguna.
Two month-ending systems are supported conceptually: Amanta and Purnimanta (regional variation).
Intercalary month Adhika-masa (Purushottama-masa) is recognized in metadata.
Vikram Samvat 2082 corresponds roughly to March 2025 - March 2026.
